data.name: Validation.Email.Invalid
data.value: Please enter a valid email address.

data.name: Validation.Consent.Required
data.value: Consent is required to subscribe to the newsletter.

data.name: Json.AlreadySubscribed
data.value: This email address is already subscribed.

data.name: Json.ConfirmationEmailSent
data.value: Thank you! We've sent a confirmation email.

data.name: Confirmation.InvalidLink
data.value: The link is invalid. Please try again.

data.name: Confirmation.InvalidOrExpired
data.value: The link is invalid or has expired.

data.name: Confirmation.AlreadyConfirmed
data.value: The subscription for this email address has already been confirmed.

data.name: Confirmation.CompletedMessage
data.value: Thank you, your newsletter subscription has been successfully confirmed.
